com.sitewhere.spi.device.request

Interface IBatchCommandInvocationRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchCommandInvocationRequest

    public interface IBatchCommandInvocationRequest
    Parameters for a batch operation that executes a command for all devices in the batch.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String META_INVOCATION_EVENT_ID
      Metadata property on batch element that holds invocation event id
      static java.lang.String PARAM_COMMAND_TOKEN
      Batch operation parameter name for command token

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCommandToken()
      Get token for command to be executed.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHardwareIds()
      Get the list of targeted device hardware ids.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameterValues()
      Get the list of parameter names mapped to values.
      java.lang.String getToken()
      Get unique token for batch request.
